summary.span: 这是与相应的 COM 对象的互操作性的托管代码需要 COM coclass 中的主接口。

span.span: This is a primary interface in a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

summary.span: 仅当您想要使用的方法共享相同的名称的 COM 对象; 事件时，才使用此主接口在这种情况下，强制转换为此接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，使用.NET 接口派生自 COM coclass 访问方法、 属性和事件的 COM 对象。

span.span: Otherwise, use the .NET interface that is derived from the COM coclass to access methods, properties, and events of the COM object.

summary.span: 有关 COM 对象的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the COM object, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AutoResolvedWinner As Boolean
public: property bool AutoResolvedWinner { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个布尔(C# 中bool ) 来确定项目是否自动冲突解决获胜。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) that determines if the item is a winner of an automatic conflict resolution.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

remarks.span:
如果值为False不一定表示该项目是自动冲突解决落选。该项目可能冲突另一项。如果项目具有
的其属性大于零，如果其AutoResolvedWinner属性为True，则自动冲突解决获胜。另一方面，如果项目有冲突，并具有其AutoResolvedWinner属性为False，则自动冲突解决中的落选。

span.para: A value of False does not necessarily indicate that the item is a loser of an automatic conflict resolution. The item could be in conflict with another item.

If an item has of its property greater than zero and if its AutoResolvedWinner property is True, it is a winner of an automatic conflict resolution. On the other hand, if the item is in conflict and has its AutoResolvedWinner property as False, it is a loser in an automatic conflict resolution.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BillingInformation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.para: 它是自由格式文本字段。
This is a free-form text field.

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) representing the clear-text body of the Outlook item.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlBodyFormat BodyFormat { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlBodyFormat get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlBodyFormat value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置常量，指示正文文本的格式。

span.span: Returns or sets an constant indicating the format of the body text.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 正文文本格式确定用于显示消息的文本的标准。Microsoft Outlook 提供了三个正文文本格式选项： 纯文本和格式文本 (RTF)、 HTML。
格式的所有文本都将丢失，当BodyFormat属性从 RTF 切换到 HTML，反之亦然。
The body text format determines the standard used to display the text of the message. Microsoft Outlook provides three body text format options: Plain Text, Rich Text (RTF), and HTML.
All text formatting will be lost when the BodyFormat property is switched from RTF to HTML and vice-versa.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Categories { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示分配给 Outlook 项目的类别。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) representing the categories assigned to the Outlook item.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 类别的已分配给某个 Outlook 项目的类别名称分隔的字符串。此属性使用在值名称 sList，位于 Windows 注册表中的 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International 下指定为多个类别值的分隔符的字符。若要将类别名称的字符串转换为类别名称的数组，使用 Microsoft Visual Basic 函数拆分。

Categories is a delimited string of category names that have been assigned to an Outlook item. This property uses the character specified in the value name, sList, under HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\International in the Windows registry, as the delimiter for multiple category values. To convert the string of category names to an array of category names, use the Microsoft Visual Basic function Split.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConversationID As String
public: property System::String ^ ConversationID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 string，用于唯一标识对象的对象属于。

span.span: Returns a string that uniquely identifies a object that the object belongs to.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性与对话相关联的项目。这些项目和对话其ConversationID属性中具有相同的值。
此属性对应于 MAPI 属性pidtagconversationid 对应。
如果在 Microsoft Outlook 版本早于 Microsoft Outlook 2010 中创建PostItem对象或者 Outlook 运行在联机模式下对 Microsoft Exchange Server 2010，此属性以前版本的 Microsoft Exchange Server返回相同的值属性。
This property associates items with a conversation. These items and the conversation all have the same value in their ConversationID property.
This property corresponds with the MAPI property PidTagConversationId.

If the PostItem object is created in a version of Microsoft Outlook earlier than Microsoft Outlook 2010, or if Outlook is running in online mode against a version of Microsoft Exchange Server earlier than Microsoft Exchange Server 2010, this property returns the same value as the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Delete() runtime managed

summary.span: 从包含项目的文件夹中移除的项。

span.span: Removes the item from the folder that contains the item.

remarks.span:
Delete方法删除集合中的单个项。若要删除中的所有项目的文件夹的集合，您必须都删除开头的文件夹中的最后一项的每个项目。例如，在文件夹的 items 集合，AllItems，如果有 n 个项目的文件夹中，启动删除 AllItems.Item(n)，递减每次您删除 AllItems.Item(1) 之前的索引处的项。删除
方法可将项目从包含文件夹移到已删除邮件文件夹。如果包含文件夹是已删除邮件文件夹， Delete方法中永久删除项目。

span.para: The Delete method deletes a single item in a collection. To delete all items in the collection of a folder, you must delete each item starting with the last item in the folder. For example, in the items collection of a folder, AllItems, if there are n number of items in the folder, start deleting the item at AllItems.Item(n), decrementing the index each time until you delete AllItems.Item(1).
The Delete method moves the item from the containing folder to the Deleted Items folder. If the containing folder is the Deleted Items folder, the Delete method removes the item permanently.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Display([in]object Modal) runtime managed
Public Sub Display (Optional Modal As Object)

param.name: Modal
param.span: 真正 要使窗口模式。默认值为 False 。

span.span: True to make the window modal. The default value is False.

summary.span: 显示一个新对象的项目。

span.span: Displays a new object for the item.

remarks.span:
Display方法支持为了向后兼容的浏览器和检查器窗口。若要激活的资源管理器或检查器窗口，请使用方法。如果您尝试使用 Microsoft Outlook 对象模型中打开"不安全的"文件系统对象 （或"freedoc"文件）
，E_FAIL 返回代码中收到 C 或 c + + 编程语言。在 Outlook 2000 和更早版本，您无法使用Display方法打开"不安全的"文件系统对象。

span.para: The Display method is supported for explorer and inspector windows for the sake of backward compatibility. To activate an explorer or inspector window, use the method.

If you attempt to open an "unsafe" file system object (or "freedoc" file) by using the Microsoft Outlook object model, you receive the E_FAIL return code in the C or C++ programming languages. In Outlook 2000 and earlier, you could open an "unsafe" file system object by using the Display method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DownloadState As OlDownloadState

summary.span: 返回一个常量，属于指示下载状态的项目的枚举。

span.span: Returns a constant that belongs to the enumeration indicating the download state of the item.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EntryID As String
public: property System::String ^ EntryID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示的对象的唯一的条目 ID。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) representing the unique Entry ID of the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

remarks.span:
此属性对应于 MAPI 属性PidTagEntryId。在存储中创建项时，
MAPI 存储提供程序分配的唯一 ID 字符串。因此， EntryID属性未设置为 Outlook 项目之前保存或发送。将项目移动到另一个存储区，例如，从收件箱到 Microsoft Exchange Server 公用文件夹，或从一个到另一个.pst 文件的个人文件夹 (.pst) 文件时条目 ID 的更改。解决方案应不依赖EntryID属性来保持唯一性，除非项目将不会移动。EntryID属性返回一个 MAPI 长期条目 id。有关详细信息有关 long-和 short-term Entryid，搜索http://msdn.microsoft.com的PidTagEntryId。

span.para: This property corresponds to the MAPI property PidTagEntryId.

A MAPI store provider assigns a unique ID string when an item is created in its store. Therefore, the EntryID property is not set for an Outlook item until it is saved or sent. The Entry ID changes when an item is moved into another store, for example, from your Inbox to a Microsoft Exchange Server public folder, or from one Personal Folders (.pst) file to another .pst file. Solutions should not depend on the EntryID property to be unique unless items will not be moved. The EntryID property returns a MAPI long-term Entry ID. For more information about long- and short-term EntryIDs, search http://msdn.microsoft.com for PidTagEntryId.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime ExpiryTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

span.span: Returns or sets a DateTime indicating the date and time at which the item becomes invalid and can be deleted.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.MailItem Forward() runtime managed

summary.span: 执行项目的转发动作，并返回将结果副本作为对象。

span.span: Executes the Forward action for an item and returns the resulting copy as a object.

returns.span: MailItem 对象，该对象代表新邮件项。

span.span: A MailItem object that represents the new mail item.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.Conversation GetConversation() runtime managed

summary.span: 获取对象，它代表此项目所属的会话。

span.span: Obtains a object that represents the conversation to which this item belongs.

returns.span: 返回一个代表此项目所属的会话的Conversation对象。

span.span: Returns a Conversation object that represents the conversation to which this item belongs.

span.para: GetConversation返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#） 如果没有对话项目。没有对话存在以下方案中某项：

item.para: 尚未保存项目。由用户操作或自动保存可以以编程方式保存项目。
尚未对于可以发送 （例如邮件项目、 约会项目或联系人项目） 的项，发送项目。
对话已通过 Windows 注册表禁用。
存储不支持对话视图 （例如，Outlook 在早于 Microsoft Exchange Server 2010 的 Microsoft Exchange 版本针对经典的联机模式下运行）。使用属性对象，以确定是否在存储区支持会话视图。

span.para: GetConversation returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) if no conversation exists for the item. No conversation exists for an item in the following scenarios:

item.para: The item has not been saved. An item can be saved programmatically, by user action, or by auto-save.
For an item that can be sent (for example, a mail item, appointment item, or contact item), the item has not been sent.
Conversations have been disabled through the Windows registry.

The store does not support the conversation view (for example, Outlook is running in classic online mode against a version of Microsoft Exchange earlier than Microsoft Exchange Server 2010). Use the property of the object to determine whether the store supports the conversation view.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GetInspector As Inspector

summary.span: 返回对象，表示检查器初始化包含的指定的项。

span.span: Returns an object that represents an inspector initialized to contain the specified item.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性是可用于返回一个新的Inspector对象中显示的项目，而不是使用方法和设置属性。如果项目已存在一个Inspector对象，则GetInspector属性将返回而不是创建一个新的Inspector对象。

This property is useful for returning a new Inspector object in which to display the item, as opposed to using the method and setting the property. If an Inspector object already exists for the item, the GetInspector property will return that Inspector object instead of creating a new one.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HTMLBody { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: HTMLBody属性应为 HTML 语法字符串。
设置HTMLBody属性集在项目属性为olEditorHTML。
设置HTMLBody属性会始终更新属性立即。
The HTMLBody property should be an HTML syntax string.
Setting the HTMLBody property sets the property of the item's to olEditorHTML.
Setting the HTMLBody property will always update the property immediately.

The Internet code page defines the text encoding scheme used by the item.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsConflict As Boolean
public: property bool IsConflict { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个布尔(C# 中bool ) 来确定项目是否存在冲突。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) that determines if the item is in conflict.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 由应用程序的状态确定项目有冲突。例如，当用户处于脱机状态，并尝试访问联机文件夹操作将失败。在此方案中，则IsConflict属性将返回True。
如果，则返回 True，指定的项目有冲突。

Whether or not an item is in conflict is determined by the state of the application. For example, when a user is offline and tries to access an online folder the action will fail. In this scenario, the IsConflict property will return True.
If True, the specified item is in conflict.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsMarkedAsTask As Boolean

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: ItemProperties集合是从零开始的集合，这意味着集合中的第一个对象，由索引值 0 引用。
The ItemProperties collection is a zero-based collection, meaning that the first object in the collection is referenced by the index 0.

Calling this method sets the value of several other properties, depending on the value provided in . For more information about the properties set by specifying , see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlRemoteStatus MarkForDownload { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlRemoteStatus get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Outlook::OlRemoteStatus value); };

This property gives remote users with less-than-ideal data-transfer capabilities increased messaging flexibility.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MessageClass { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性对应于 MAPI 属性PidTagMessageClass。MessageClass属性链接到窗体所基于的项目。选择项目时，Outlook 将使用的邮件类来定位窗体和公开其属性，如答复命令。

This property corresponds to the MAPI property PidTagMessageClass. The MessageClass property links the item to the form on which it is based. When an item is selected, Outlook uses the message class to locate the form and expose its properties, such as Reply commands.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Mileage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示项目的里程。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) representing the mileage for an item.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 这是自由格式的字符串字段，并可用于存储里程为了报销相关联的项目 （例如 100 英里的约会、 联系人或任务记录） 的信息。

This is a free-form string field and can be used to store mileage information associated with the item (for example, 100 miles documented for an appointment, contact, or task) for purposes of reimbursement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Move([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.MAPIFolder DestFldr) runtime managed
Public Function Move (DestFldr As MAPIFolder) As Object

param.name: DestFldr
param.span: 返回 Folder 对象的表达式。目标文件夹。

span.span: An expression that returns a Folder object. The destination folder.

summary.span: 将 Microsoft Outlook项目移至新文件夹中。

span.span: Moves a Microsoft Outlook item to a new folder.

returns.span: 一个 Object 值，代表已移至指定文件夹中的项目。

span.span: An Object value that represents the item which has been moved to the designated folder.

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Post() runtime managed

summary.span: 发送 （投递）对象。

span.span: Sends (posts) the object.

span.para: Post方法，类似于方法对象，用于将公告保存到目标公用文件夹，而不是邮寄。
The Post method, which is analogous to the method for the object, is used to save the post to the target public folder instead of mailing it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PrintOut() runtime managed

summary.span: 打印 Outlook 项目使用所有默认设置。 PrintOut 方法是唯一可用于打印的 Outlook 方法。

span.span: Prints the Outlook item using all default settings. The PrintOut method is the only Outlook method that can be used for printing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReminderOverrideDefault { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个布尔(C# 中bool ) 值为True ，如果提醒重写项的默认提醒行为。

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 必须设置ReminderOverrideDefault属性来验证和属性。
You must set the ReminderOverrideDefault property to validate the and the properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReminderPlaySound { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 必须设置ReminderPlaySound属性验证属性。
The ReminderPlaySound property must be set in order to validate the property.

span.span: Read/write.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性才有效如果和属性设置为True。
This property is only valid if the and properties are set to True.

A object that represents the reply.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ RTFBody { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字节数组，表示富文本格式的 Microsoft Outlook 项目的正文。

span.span: Returns or sets a byte array that represents the body of the Microsoft Outlook item in Rich Text Format.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 您可以使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的 system.text.encoding.asciiencoding.getstring （） 方法将字节数组转换为字符串。
You can use the System.Text.Encoding.AsciiEncoding.GetString() method in C# or Visual Basic to convert an array of bytes to a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save() runtime managed

summary.span: 将 Microsoft Outlook项目保存到当前文件夹中，如果是新项目，则保存到该项目类型的 Outlook 默认文件夹中。

span.span: Saves the Microsoft Outlook item to the current folder or, if this is a new item, to the Outlook default folder for the item type.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveAs (string Path, object Type);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SaveAs([in]string Path, [in]object Type) runtime managed
Public Sub SaveAs (Path As String, Optional Type As Object)

span.span: The path in which to save the item.

param.name: Type

span.span: The file type to save.

param.span: 可以是下列OlSaveAsType常量之一： olHTML、 olMSG、 olRTF、 olTemplate、 olDoc、olTXT、 olVCal、 olVCard， olICal，或olMSGUnicode。

span.span: Can be one of the following OlSaveAsType constants: olHTML, olMSG, olRTF, olTemplate, olDoc,olTXT, olVCal, olVCard, olICal, or olMSGUnicode.

summary.span: 将 Microsoft Outlook项目以指定文件类型的格式保存到指定的路径。如果没有指定文件类型，则使用 MSG 格式 (.msg)。

span.span: Saves the Microsoft Outlook item to the specified path and in the format of the specified file type. If the file type is not specified, the MSG format (.msg) is used.

span.para: 此外请注意，即使olDoc是有效的OlSaveAsType常量、 无法保存文档格式，以 HTML 格式的邮件和olDoc常量适用于 Microsoft Word 设置为默认电子邮件编辑器时，才。

Also note that even though olDoc is a valid OlSaveAsType constant, messages in HTML format cannot be saved in Document format, and the olDoc constant works only if Microsoft Word is set up as the default email editor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Saved As Boolean
public: property bool Saved { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 值为True ，如果自上次保存以来尚未修改的 Outlook 项目。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) value that is True if the Outlook item has not been modified since the last save.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) that represents the type of entry for the e-mail address of the sender of the Outlook item, such as 'SMTP' for Internet address, 'EX' for a Microsoft Exchange server address, etc. Read-only.

span.para: 此属性对应于 MAPI 属性PidTagSenderName。
如果希望检索发件人的完全限定电子邮件地址，请使用属性。
This property corresponds to the MAPI property PidTagSenderName.
If you wish to retrieve the fully qualified e-mail address of the sender, use the property.

span.para: Session属性和可以交替使用方法来获取当前会话的NameSpace对象。这两个成员的作用相同。例如，以下语句对执行相同的功能：

The Session property and the method can be used interchangeably to obtain the NameSpace object for the current session. Both members serve the same purpose. For example, the following pairs of statements perform the same function:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime ToDoTaskOrdinal { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个代表的任务的序号值的DateTime值。

span.span: Returns or sets a DateTime value that represents the ordinal value of the task for the .

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#） 如果属性设置为False。
此属性用于指示任务在父组，如今天组或明天组中的待办事项栏中应如何排序。此属性中使用的值不具有任何值的对应关系， ，或属性。
This property returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) if the property is set to False.

This property is used to indicate how the task should be ordered within the parent groups, such as the Today group or the Tomorrow group, of the To-Do Bar. The value used in this property does not have any relation to the values of the , , or properties.
